items: NO3- (Nitrate) and NO2- (Nitrite): Indication of biological filtration processes.
GH (General Hardness): Indication of mineral content (magnesium and calcium).
Cl2 (Chlorine): Indication of chlorine content in tap water harmful to fish.
pH: The pH value indicates the degree of acidity in water.
KH (Carbonate Hardness): Important for pH value stabilisation.
Dip the test strip for 5 seconds;
Shake the test strip to remove excess water;

Position the test strip in the correct area of the bottle and read the values by comparing the obtained colours with the bottle's colour scale. Check the meaning of the obtained values in the included table and corrective action advice. For more detailed information, consult the 'CIANO CARE' guide;
Measure the water at least every 15 days.
Follow the CIANO CARE guide instructions.

details.value: 6 tests in one Strip: NO3-, NO2-, GH, Cl2, pH and KH.
50 Strips: 300 Individual Tests.
Usage: Easy.
Quick: 1 minute.

Protection for all types of fish with natural plant extracts. Stimulates the immune system and reduces the risk of diseases.

details.text: WHY use FISH PROTECTION DOSATOR CIANO®?

details.value: Protects fish gills, skin and fins with natural plant extracts and essential vitamins that fish are accustomed to in their natural biotope. Works as a natural coating that protects fish from disease-causing agents, with long-lasting effect. The FISH PROTECTION dosator is ideal for controlled, continuous and worry-free conditioner addition over time.
The Fish Protection Dosator is UNIVERSAL.

Until now, liquid dosing in aquariums has been done manually, which leads to forgetfulness and dosage variations that cause peaks in fish protection. With the Fish Protection dosator, and through its automatic dosing system, protection for your fish will be continuous (without peaks) and more efficient over 60 days*, (see graph).
*Estimated consumption time
The Fish Protection dosator is completely autonomous, requiring no energy for its operation. It only needs you to respect the water level (MAX and MIN) indicated on the dosator.

Plants can easily compete with algae, which will then recede.
The PLANTS PROTECTION dosator is ideal for controlled, continuous and worry-free liquid addition over time.

Water Clear & Protection quickly transforms cloudy water into crystal clear water suitable for your aquarium.

details.text: WHY use WATER CLEAR & PROTECTION CIANO®?

items: Removes fine turbidity that is normally not removed by the aquarium filter sponge.
Shake before use. Remove activated carbon and/or adsorbent filter media from the filter during treatment. Do not remove the sponge, reinsert it after achieving the desired results.
Add the dose of WATER CLEAR & PROTECTION preferably at the filter's water outlet.
Dose: 10mL for 40L (always for the total volume of aquarium water).
Measure water with "WATER TEST STRIPS" 6 in 1 CIANO®, at least every 15 days.
Follow the instructions of this product and the "CIANO CARE" guide.

details.value: Water: Keeps water crystal clear.
Turbidity: Removes fine turbidity.
Prevention: Prevents and eliminates water colours.
Regular use: Monthly.
Live bacteria for a perfect aquarium ecosystem.

items: Optimises biological filtration and water quality for the well-being of the entire aquarium ecosystem.
Mixture of different live bacteria that naturally degrade ammonia and nitrite.
Shake before use. Add the dose of WATER BIO-BACT preferably at the filter's water outlet.
Contains live bacteria, store in a place with temperature between +4°/+35°C
Dose: 10mL for 100L (maintenance); 10mL for 40L (aquarium initiation and after disease treatment). Always for the total volume of aquarium water.
Measure water with 'WATER TEST STRIPS' 6 in 1 CIANO®, at least every 15 days
Follow the instructions of this product and the 'CIANO CARE' guide.

details.value: Bacteria: Live bacteria.
Ecosystem: Perfect aquarium ecosystem
Eliminates: Ammonia and Nitrite
Regular use: Every 15 days.
Protection for all types of fish with natural plant extracts. Stimulates the immune system and reduces the risk of diseases.

items: Protects fish gills, skin and fins with natural plant extracts and essential vitamins that fish are accustomed to in their natural biotope.
Works as a natural coating that protects fish from disease-causing agents, with long-lasting effect.
Shake before use. Add the dose of FISH PROTECTION preferably at the filter's water outlet.
Dose: 10mL for 40L (always for the total volume of aquarium water).
It is recommended to use the FISH PROTECTION dosator for controlled, continuous and worry-free conditioner addition over time.
Follow the instructions of this product and the 'CIANO CARE' guide.

details.value: Protection: All types of fish
Extracts: Natural plants
Diseases: Reduces the risk of diseases.
Regular use: Every 15 days.
A boost for all types of plants.

items: Provides plants with various minerals and essential elements, easily assimilated by plants.
Prevents and corrects deficiencies such as lack of iron and potassium.
Prevents algae growth by stimulating optimal plant growth.
Shake before use. Add the dose of PLANTS PROTECTION preferably at the filter's water outlet.
Dose: 10mL for 40L (always for the total volume of aquarium water)
It is recommended to use the PLANTS PROTECTION dosator for controlled, continuous and worry-free liquid addition over time.
Follow the instructions of this product and the 'CIANO CARE' guide.

details.value: Protection: Boost for all types of plants.
Plants: Minerals and essential elements.
Deficiencies: Prevents and corrects.
Regular use: Every 15 days.
Quickly transforms tap water into water suitable for your aquarium.

items: Quickly and durably neutralizes toxic substances like chlorine, chloramine, and heavy metals.
Protects fish gills, skin, and fins with natural substance extracts and essential vitamins they are accustomed to in their natural biotope.
Reduces stress and the risk of diseases in fish.
Shake before use. Add the dose of WATER CONDITIONER preferably near the filter's water outlet.
Dose: 10mL for 40L of water to treat. (If starting an aquarium, add the dose corresponding to the total aquarium volume.
For partial water changes, add the dose corresponding to the volume of water changed (if adding for the total water volume, it brings no disadvantages).
Follow the instructions of this product and the CIANO CARE guide.

details.value: Quickly transforms: Tap water into water suitable for your aquarium.
Protection: Reduces stress and the risk of diseases in fish.
Toxic substances: Quickly and durably neutralizes.
Aquarium: Support for proper initiation.
Liquid anti-phosphate complex for freshwater aquariums.

items: WATER ALGAE blocks the phosphate present in water, making it unavailable for algae.
WATER ALGAE is not a biocide according to regulation no. 528/2012.

Shake before use. An initial removal of algae attached to glass, objects, and anything else you find necessary is recommended. Make a 25% water change before use (adding WATER CONDITIONER is recommended).
Add the dose of WATER ALGAE preferably at the filter's water outlet.
Dose: 10mL for 40L (always for the total volume of aquarium water).
Clean the sponge halfway through treatment.
If the problem persists after 15 days, repeat the procedure. Adding WATER BIO-BACT at the end of treatment is recommended to strengthen biological filtration.
Measure water with 'WATER TEST STRIPS' 6 in 1 CIANO®, at least every 15 days.
Follow the instructions of this product and the 'CIANO CARE' guide.

details.value: Anti-phosphate: Blocks phosphate present in water.
Effect: Long-lasting.
Action: Quick.
Controlled elevation of water carbonate hardness and pH stabilization.

items: KH represents the water's buffering capacity, that is, the water's ability to oppose pH variations, extremely harmful to fish.
The KH value should be above 3°dH and adapted to the aquarium's biotope.
Shake before use. Add the dose of WATER KH & pH preferably at the filter's water outlet.
Dose: 10mL for 40L (always for the total volume of aquarium water).
One dose of WATER KH & pH increases 1°dH and 0.1 pH.
Double the dose if you want an increase of 2°dH and 0.2 pH.
Measure water with 'WATER TEST STRIPS' 6 in 1 CIANO®, at least every 15 days.
Follow the instructions of this product and the 'CIANO CARE' guide.

details.value: pH: Stabilizes pH.
Carbonate hardness: Allows regulation.
Action: Quick and long-lasting.
Harmless: For fish, snails, shrimp, and filter.
Precisely and safely elevates total water hardness.

items: Adds essential minerals for good water quality and fish health.
The GH value should be above 3°dH and adapted to the aquarium's biotope.
Shake before use. Add the dose of WATER GH preferably at the filter's water outlet.
Dose: 10mL for 40L (always for the total volume of aquarium water).
One dose of WATER GH increases 1°dH.
Double the dose if you want an increase of 2°dH.
Measure water with 'WATER TEST STRIPS' 6 in 1 CIANO®, at least every 15 days.
Follow the instructions of this product and the 'CIANO CARE' guide.

details.value: Water: Safely elevates total water hardness.
Calcium: Adds calcium to water.
Magnesium: Adds magnesium to water.
Action: Quick and long-lasting.

The Emotions Nature One 100 is an excellence aquarium fully equipped, featuring a unique design and high-quality materials. The Emotions One comes with the new CFBIO XL filtration system with enhanced mechanical, biological, and chemical filtration capabilities. It includes an economical LED lighting system with superior light quality. Its details make the Emotions One a unique aquarium in the world of fishkeeping.

items: 1 Cabinet with lacquered doors and high relief;

details.value: The new Emotions Pro 40 reaffirms its aquarium line and combines elegance with technology. The CFBIO 'L' Ciano® filtration ensures excellent water renewal and perfect maintenance of aquatic balance. It includes an economical LED lighting system with Lightboost combining 9000K and 6500k. The size of the Emotions Pro 40 adapts to any space in your home.

items: 1 LED lighting system CLE40 Ciano® (LED + Converter 13W – 24VDC);

details.value: The aquarium is equipped with a CFBIO 'L' Ciano® biological filtration system, with enhanced filtration power due to its horizontal filtration (filter media). The filter is equipped with a high-performance 260 l/h motor, an efficient 50W heater, and consumables (1 Water Clear & Protection 'L', 1 Water Bio-Bact 'L', and 1 Water Foam 'L') for chemical, biological, and mechanical filtration. As an option, you can add a completely submersible digital thermometer with integrated sensor.
Economical, Powerful, Adjustable, and Universal are the characteristics of the new CLE40 Ciano®. Ciano®'s new lighting system ensures greater brightness with lower resource consumption.

As is characteristic of Ciano, the Emotions Pro is manufactured with excellent quality materials, featuring lacquered aluminum frames. The lid allows full access to the aquarium, facilitating its maintenance. As an option, you can purchase an Emotions Pro cabinet developed with the same lines that provide a perfect set.

The new Emotions Pro 150 reaffirms its aquarium line and combines elegance with technology. The Emotions Pro comes with the new CFBIO XL filtration system with enhanced mechanical, biological, and chemical filtration capabilities. It includes an economical LED lighting system with Lightboost combining 9000K and 6500k.

items: 1 LED lighting system CLE150 Ciano® (LED + Converter 59W - 24VDC);

details.value: The aquarium is equipped with our powerful CFBIO XL Ciano® biological filtration system, with enhanced filtration capacity and efficiency. The filter is fully equipped with a high-performance MAX. 850 l/h motor, an efficient heater, a completely submersible digital thermometer with integrated sensor (option), and consumables (2 x Water Clear & Protection "XL", 2 x Water Bio-Bact "XL", 1 x Water Foam "XL", 1 x Water Foam Coarse "XL", and 1 x Water Pad "XL"), for chemical, biological, and mechanical filtration.
Economical, Powerful, Adjustable, and Universal are the characteristics of the new CLE150 Ciano®. Ciano®'s new lighting system ensures greater brightness with lower resource consumption.

As is characteristic of Ciano, the Emotions Pro is manufactured with excellent quality materials, featuring lacquered aluminum frames. The lid allows full access to the aquarium, facilitating its maintenance. As an option, you can purchase an Emotions Pro cabinet developed with the same lines that provide a perfect set.

Purity, elegance, harmony, decoration, and innovation: the fusion of these words gives rise to the Nexus Pure 15 aquarium, created with you and your well-being in mind. Equipped with the latest technology, the Nexus Pure 15 includes LED lighting and a highly efficient Ciano® filtration system.
Its cube-shaped design with polished corners stands out, showcasing its excellence in quality and decoration, which will bring tranquility to any place, whether in a home living room or workplace.

For easy maintenance, the Nexus 15 is equipped with the internal CF40 Ciano® filtration system, optimized to reduce fish stress and with a spray bar that allows more uniform water distribution and greater oxygenation.

Integrated into the Nexus 15 is an LED lighting support, which includes the CLA20 Ciano®, a low-voltage lighting system certified for total safety, ensuring natural lighting and low energy consumption.

The Emotions Nature® ONE 80 is an excellence aquarium fully equipped with a unique design and high-quality materials. The Emotions® ONE comes equipped with the new CFBIO XL filtration system, with capacity for enhanced mechanical, biological, and chemical filtration. It includes an economical LED lighting system with superior light quality. Its details make the Emotions® ONE a unique aquarium in the world of fishkeeping.

items: 1 Cabinet with lacquered doors and relief;

details.value: The Emotions One features a glass lid with aluminum finishes, an elegant and sophisticated design, laser engraving, and stainless steel hinges. Versatility and comfort are also present in the lid, as it allows full access to the aquarium but includes a small food lid optimized for an automatic feeder.
Equipped with a certified Ciano® LED lighting system CLE80, which provides economical and powerful lighting.

The aquarium is equipped with our powerful CFBIO XL Ciano® biological filtration system, with enhanced filtration capacity and efficiency. The filter is fully equipped with a high-performance MAX 850 L/H motor, an efficient 150W heater, a completely submersible digital thermometer with integrated sensor (option), and consumables (1 x Water Clear & Protection "XL", 2 x Water Bio-Bact "XL", 1 x Water Foam "XL", 1 x Water Foam Coarse "XL", and 1 x Water Pad "XL"), for chemical, biological, and mechanical filtration.
Specially designed for the Emotions One, it is a modern-line cabinet that stands out for its robustness and finishes, featuring two lacquered and raised doors equipped with a push-pull system.

The new Emotions Pro 120 reaffirms its aquarium line and combines elegance with technology. The Emotions Pro comes equipped with the new CFBIO XL filtration system with capacity for enhanced mechanical, biological, and chemical filtration. It includes an economical LED lighting system with Lightboost combining 9000K with 6500K.

The CUBE 15 is a small glass aquarium that is easy to use and will easily adapt to any room in your home.

Its cube-shaped design stands out, made entirely of glass with polished corners, showcasing its excellence in quality and decoration that will bring tranquility to any space, whether in a home room or workplace.

Integrated into the Cube 15 is an LED lighting support, which includes the CLA20 Universal Ciano®, a certified low-voltage lighting system for total safety, ensuring natural lighting with low energy consumption.
The internal filter CF20 Ciano® is equipped with a flow regulator that makes it perfect for small fish like Betta Splendens. The filtration capacity will keep the water crystal clear and odor-free.

Purity, Elegance, Harmony, Decoration, and Innovation - from the fusion of these words was born the Nexus Pure 25 aquarium. Created with you and your well-being in mind. Equipped with the latest technology, the Nexus Pure 25 includes an LED lighting system and a highly effective Ciano® filtration system.

Its cube-shaped design stands out, made entirely of glass with polished corners, showcasing its excellence in quality and decoration that will bring tranquility to any space, whether in a home room or workplace.

For easy maintenance, the Nexus 25 is equipped with the internal filtration system CF40 Ciano®, optimized for reduced fish stress and with a spray bar that allows for more uniform water distribution and increased oxygenation.

Integrated into the Nexus 25 is an LED lighting support, with an included LED lighting system (2.5W - 12V) and the possibility of adding a second one, powerful and economical, enhancing the brightness of the aquarium and its fish.

It is also possible to complement the Nexus Pure 14C with an LED lighting system, the CLN5 RGB Ciano®, a touch and certified system that offers excellent performance with reduced energy consumption. An aquarium equipped with complete equipment to discover fishkeeping with full confidence, equipped with a motor, heater, pre-installed air pump, and a biological filter. The 30PPI FOAM (sponge) and the CFBIO 150 Ciano® filter ensure excellent water renewal and perfect maintenance of aquatic balance, while the WATER CLEAR Ciano® dose makes the water crystal clear and eliminates odors.
With perfect and resistant finishes, the Aqua 80 stands out for its elegance and safety, with shock-resistant plastic frames, polished corners, and its hinged lid.

The aquarium is equipped with a CFBIO150 Ciano® biological filtration system, with more filtration power due to its horizontal filtration (filter media). The filter is equipped with a high-performance 260 l/h motor, an efficient 100W heater, and consumables (1 Water Clear "L" and 1 FOAM "L"), for chemical, biological, and mechanical filtration. As an option, it is possible to add a completely submersible digital thermometer with integrated sensor.
The Aqua 80 features the CLA60 Ciano®, a certified low-voltage lighting system for total safety, ensuring natural lighting with low energy consumption.

The lighting system is touch-sensitive, turns on with a light touch. To activate RGB mode, touch again. Once active, the RGB mode works automatically and repeatedly, transitioning colors every hour (1st red, 2nd green, 3rd blue). The color transition can be done manually. Note: If you touch when blue is active, the RGB mode will be deactivated, returning to white. The system always starts with white color. To turn off the LED, touch and hold for 3 seconds.
Transition of colors: red, green, and blue

The CLA20 Ciano® is a certified low-voltage lighting system, ensuring total safety while providing natural lighting and low energy consumption. With this system, you'll bring even more life to your aquarium. The CLA20 Ciano® is compatible with Ciano® brand aquariums (see technical information).

The CLA20 Ciano® is a certified low-voltage lighting system for complete safety, providing natural lighting and low energy consumption. With a very simple installation, the CLA20 Universal fits all frameless aquariums with 3, 4, or 5 mm thick glass.
Compatible with 3 mm, 4 mm and 5 mm glass.

The CLA60 Plants Ciano® is a certified low-voltage lighting system for total safety and low energy consumption, designed to promote plant growth. The CLA60 Plants Ciano® is compatible with Ciano® brand aquariums (see technical information).
Promotes plant growth.

The CLA60 Ciano® is a certified low-voltage lighting system for complete safety, providing natural lighting with low energy consumption. With this system, your aquarium will come even more to life. The CLA60 Ciano® is compatible with Ciano® brand aquariums (see technical information).

The CF20 Ciano® is an internal filter for small aquariums. Equipped with a flow regulator that makes it perfect for small fish like Betta Splendens. It is a high-performance filtration system, easy to install and with reduced maintenance. Ideal for aquariums between 5 and 20 liters.
Flow regulator
This regulator makes it ideal for small fish like Betta Splendens, as it allows control of the water flow, making it almost negligible, avoiding fish stress.
Adjustable water flow.
Perfect for small fish like Betta Splendens.
Installation and maintenance.
The CF40 Ciano® is a high-performance internal filter, easy to install and with reduced maintenance. Optimized for reduced fish stress. Ideal for aquariums between 20 and 40 liters.

items: 1 Spray bar (more uniform water distribution and increased oxygenation);
My Ciano App: For simple management of the filtration system, Ciano provides the My Ciano app, which allows real-time monitoring of consumable wear, creating alerts for their renewal;

Triple filtration: Prepared for triple filtration: chemical, biological, and mechanical, which will eliminate substances harmful to fish and keep the water crystal clear without odors, combat algae, maintain the ecosystem, and retain particles and organic matter present in the water;

details.value: More uniform water distribution and increased oxygenation.
Optimized for reduced fish stress.

The CFSTONE 40 Ciano® is a next-generation internal filter. Its stone-shaped design allows it to blend in with the aquarium décor. It is a high-performance filtration system, easy to install and with low maintenance. Its two independent water circuits ensure water cleaning, treatment, and promote bacterial colonization. Ideal for aquariums between 20 and 40 liters with a maximum height of up to 35 cm.

items: 1 Adjustable spray bar up to 35 cm high (more even water distribution and increased oxygenation);

details.value: The CFSTONE is not just a filter. Its innovative design allows it to blend with the aquarium decoration due to its stone-like appearance and the camouflage of the power cable.

details.text: Designed for triple filtration: chemical, biological, and mechanical, which will eliminate harmful substances for fish, keep the water crystal clear and odor-free, fight algae, maintain the ecosystem, and retain particles and organic matter present in the water.

details.value: Innovative stone-shaped filter.
1st Ensures water cleaning and treatment. 2nd Promotes bacterial colonization.
2 options for water outlet
Adjustable up to 35 cm

Each package contains 6 suction cups of 16.8mm, for replacement whenever needed. They are easy to install, just place in the desired position and press against the glass. They are compatible with Ciano® CF internal filters and all accessories with the same size fittings.

The THERMOMETER Ciano® is a high-precision digital thermometer, completely submersible, with integrated sensor and wireless. The THERMOMETER is compatible with Ciano® CFBIO 150, CFBIO 250, CFBIO L, and CFBIO XL filters.

The Tartarium 40, a glass terrarium, is equipped with supports and a dry area in high-quality white plastic with high-gloss finish and a transparent plastic cover for your turtle's rest and optimal heat exposure, essential for its well-being and growth.
With high-quality materials, the tartarium is made of glass, which allows a complete view of all turtle movements, and white plastic with high-gloss finish on its four supports and ramp.

So that the turtle can rest and warm up, the tartarium 40 has a dry area that the turtle can easily access through its ramp, which can be positioned in three different ways with easy and harmonious fixation, and to prevent the turtle from jumping, it has a transparent cover.

As an option, the CFSTONE 40 is available, a next-generation internal filter that, in addition to its filtering role, also has a decorative role, since its design is stone-shaped, and its electrical cables are camouflaged. With two independent water circuits, it ensures water cleaning and treatment in one, and guarantees bacterial colonization in the other, its versatility with two water outlet options makes it ideal for the tartarium.
Supports in white plastic with high gloss.
Transparent cover to prevent turtles from jumping
Dry area for rest and sun exposure
CFStone (optional)
